page.title: 20AUTHORS
page.content: The survey in the Steeple Ashton area has been carried out by the Steeple Ashton St.Mary's C.E. Primary School and the Steeple Ashton Women's Institute.The co-ordinator has been Mr.Michael Green the headmaster.The members of the W.I. have been Mrs Mary Boyce,Mrs Lystra Berrett,Mrs Chris Little and Mrs Betty Merther.The main children taking part from the school have been Nathan Ellis,Suzanne Griffin, ,Robert Shipley,Deborah Lewis,Luci Angus and Sally Matthews. Preparation work has been done by Mrs Jenny Fry,the school clerical assistant: other children have worked on the survey as a part of a school project during the term.Various local people have helped, particularly Mr Godfrey Smith and the Cottle family.
